topics.body: A friend of mine told me to play Person 4 Golden instead of the original PS2 version, but I've always preferred playing the originals of games. [spoiler]Besides, I'm not a big fan of handheld gaming. I mean I could just get a Vita TV, but that resolution is so low for my TV... I would've preferred there to be rgb or component output as well so I could just use it on my crt monitor. :v[/spoiler]
